Author: B2ANDLTD
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥[ANN][ICO] B2AND Future of Online Advertising ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥
Body: B2AND's primary goal is to facilitate online advertising campaigns to go viral. B2AND token (B2C) will act as a common token for all participants, including advertisers, who will use it to pay their B2AND campaigns as well as campaign participants, who will earn B2Cs, when participating and recommending B2AND campaigns to their friends/connections. The process itself same time widens B2C token holder base, since everybody, who participates in any B2AND campaign will be new B2C holder.  As an example advertiser creates B2AND campaign and purchases B2C tokens to pay the campaign and distribute campaign rewards (B2C tokens). Advertiser sends this campaign to 1000 regular customers known to advertiser, who then by participating in this campaign will earn B2C tokens and by referring it to their friends will earn more B2C tokens. Same way these people who have been invited to this campaign will be able to earn B2C tokens by participating in campaign and by referring it to others. Now this one example campaign that was sent to 1000 people has grown to 10000 people and all of these 10000 people are new B2C token holders.  So B2C is used to pay campaigns and reward campaign participants and as a result of this also to widen B2C token holder base, which in turn brings higher liquidity on open market.  Moreover, B2AND itself only facilitates the process by providing platform, that automatizes everything and all content is created by the advertisers by themselves, not B2AND. In Our 3rd generation version all new campaigns are also visible on blockchain, so there's transparency from all the campaigns and through our API campaign can be created/initiated from any front-end, meaning that any digital advertising agency can offer B2AND services directly from their own platforms.  First generation of B2AND platform is already launched as commercial platform and not just MVP or other type of POC product. B2C will be a game changer on our business model.  We wish all the best for Exchain and any other blockchain initiatives working on digital marketing space, but do not see other companies applying same business concept, what we have.

Author: B2ANDLTD
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥[ANN][ICO] B2AND Future of Online Advertising ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥
Body: That's a good question! In the current B2AND 1st generation platform (current working platform), advertisers can create landing page and email campaign message to be sent using the B2AND campaign wizard where two different reward types are given to the campaign participants. These rewards are: 1) for participating i.e. seeing the promotion landing page and 2) referring the campaign to some friend so that the referring leads the friend to visit the promotion landing page  Once above mentioned elements are set up, advertiser basically brings in the start level of promotion recipients (i.e advertiser's loyal customer database etc.) The campaign will be sent out to the start level recipients according to definitions of advertiser. First reward acts as an incentive for message recipient to have a look at the promotional landing page. Second reward acts as an incentive for message recipient to share the message further to his/her friends in order to get that reward and also give friends the possibility to be entitled for the same reward as message recipient has already assured.  Note the above description is only for the 1st generation B2AND platform. For more details on the planned platform development/various generations of B2AND platform, please refer to page 11 of our Whitepaper.

Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥[ANN][ICO] B2AND Future of Online Advertising ğŸ”¥ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸ”¥
Body: B2AND l Website l Whitepaper l Facebook l Twitter l Instagram l Youtube l Reddit l Medium l Linkedin l Telegram l  B2AND offers advertisers a unique online service to approach their target groups by distributing their marketing campaigns by way of viral marketing.   About B2AND is a result-oriented cloud-based online platform providing easy-to-use and scalable service utilising viral marketing within marketing campaigns in new innovative and extremely effective way.  Nowadays, traditional advertising models do not fully satisfy contemporary needs of a potential advertisers and blockchain represent an exceptional solution for this. The new concept creates advertisers out of consumers and generates peer-to-peer advertising earnings through blockchain, transforming viral marketing to truly transparent and measurable.  The new B2AND decentralized eco-system will be based on successful B2AND platform and will rely on a decentralized architecture on Ethereum blockchain supported by B2AND token. The B2AND decentralized eco-system will be transformed through four generations, whereas 1st generation B2AND platform has already been deployed.
